My friend Celine isn't very well-to-do whereas her boyfriend's family is very well-off. Last week, she threw a party at her place where cheap wines were served. The sofas in her apartment are made of some cheap material. Her television is cheap and nasty. As many of us wanted to watch the news, I said "If I could turn the TV on please." She then said "Sure. If you would switch to the news channel." Recently, she got some new clothes on the cheap from a shop about to go into liquidation. She bought a cheap pair of sneakers that fell apart after a couple months so I bought her a good quality pair. She's too mean to buy new trainers. She's very cheap with the air conditioner too - it's only on for an hour each day then she turns the fans on and opens the windows instead but the air conditioner was dirt cheap. She vacationed in Macau last Saturday but she's so cheap she didn't even buy us postcards. She stayed in a hotel where it serves cheap and cheerful food and sells cheap and cheerful clothes. She's a trumpeter. She explained to us regarding a piece by Clementi "This passage should be played lyrically rather than rhythmically, otherwise it's a bit cheap." I saw lots of her pencil marks on the score, such as Cantabile, silence, no pause here, just separate, clean pedal, more melodic voicing, remain soft, stay soft, quiet, hear tenor, clearer, articulate, in time, silvery soft, gentler, take time.... Regarding teaching, she said "I prefer payment in blocks. My students pay for four lessons at a time or monthly. For this month, it's okay to pay on a lesson-by-lesson basis because maybe you wanna see what it's like to have lessons. From next month onwards, pay for four lessons at a time. Students of all standards are welcome. I'm also an accompanist who accompanies singers for live performances." She asked me to get her some Ravel scores as I can get them on the cheap from a friend of mine. We watched a boxing match in which Paul hit Jason with a cheap shot after he lost to Jason. We also watched a comedy show which was full of cheap laughs. The comedian is famous for his vulgar manner and wearing a vulgar suit. His grandfather was a cheap gangster and liar. It's been reported that some iPhone models, particularly iPhone seven emit radiation over the legal limit so I suggest you use Samsung Note Ten Plus instead since to date it emits the least radiation out of all phones. Samsung Galaxy S Nine Plus also has amazingly low radiation. My friend Paul got off at the wrong stop and had to wait for another train. I said "Hpw on earth did you miss your stop?" He then said "I'm sorry. What can I say?" He's a bassoonist. I complimented him on his bassoon skills. He said "Yes, what can I say?" The current situation is very bad. I said "Well, yes, what can I say?" This morning, I was shocked when I saw a car crash in the street. He then said "I can imagine." His brother too said "I'm sure you were." Anyway, I think it's time to get my beauty sleep. My girlfriend has snuggled down into her warm duvet and got some of her beauty sleep. Night and sweet dreams!

My friend Celine isn't very well-to-do whereas her boyfriend's family is very well-off. Last week, she threw a party at her place where cheap wines were served. The sofas in her apartment are made of some cheap material. Her television is cheap and nasty. As many of us wanted to watch the news, I said "If I could turn the TV on please." She then said "Sure. If you would switch to the news channel." Recently, she got some new clothes on the cheap from a shop about to go into liquidation. She bought a cheap pair of sneakers that fell apart after a couple months so I bought her a good quality pair. She's too mean to buy new trainers. She's very cheap with the air conditioner too - it's only on for an hour each day then she turns the fans on and opens the windows instead but the air conditioner was dirt cheap. She vacationed in Macau last Saturday but she's so cheap she didn't even buy us postcards. She stayed in a hotel where it serves cheap and cheerful food and sells cheap and cheerful clothes. She's a trumpeter. She explained to us regarding a piece by Clementi "This passage should be played lyrically rather than rhythmically, otherwise it's a bit cheap." I saw lots of her pencil marks on the score, such as Cantabile, silence, no pause here, just separate, clean pedal, more melodic voicing, remain soft, stay soft, quiet, hear tenor, clearer, articulate, in time, silvery soft, gentler, take time.... Regarding teaching, she said "I prefer payment in blocks. My students pay for four lessons at a time or monthly. For this month, it's okay to pay on a lesson-by-lesson basis because maybe you wanna see what it's like to have lessons. From next month onwards, pay for four lessons at a time. Students of all standards are welcome. I'm also an accompanist who accompanies singers for live performances." She asked me to get her some Ravel scores as I can get them on the cheap from a friend of mine. We watched a boxing match in which Paul hit Jason with a cheap shot after he lost to Jason. We also watched a comedy show which was full of cheap laughs. The comedian is famous for his vulgar manner and wearing a vulgar suit. His grandfather was a cheap gangster and liar. His jokes and jibes were cheap and vulgar. It's been reported that some iPhone models, particularly iPhone seven emit radiation over the legal limit so I suggest you use Samsung Note Ten Plus instead since to date it emits the least radiation out of all phones. Samsung Galaxy S Nine Plus also has amazingly low radiation. My friend Paul got off at the wrong stop and had to wait for another train. I said "How on earth did you miss your stop?" He then said "I'm sorry. What can I say?" He's a bassoonist. I complimented him on his bassoon skills. He said "Yes, what can I say?" The current situation is very bad. I said "Well, yes, what can I say?" This morning, I was shocked when I saw a car crash in the street. He then said "I can imagine." His brother too said "I'm sure you were." Anyway, I think it's time to get my beauty sleep. My girlfriend has snuggled down into her warm duvet and got some of her beauty sleep. Night and sweet dreams!
